doc.title: Family Portrait
doc.plot: After months of threats and years of physical abuse a terrified mother calls emergency services when her estranged husband turns up with a gun. She fears for her life as her violent husband unexpectedly returns to the family home. On calling the emergency services for help, an anxious operator tries to comfort and reassure her that help is on the way. As the noises get closer and closer to discovering her hiding place, she realizes that her son is home
